      • UbiMqtt

        public UbiMqtt(java.lang.String serverAddress,
               int bufferWindowInSeconds)
        Constructs a Ubimqtt instance but does not connect to a server
        Parameters:
        serverAddress - the Mqtt server to use
        bufferWindowInSeconds - the maximum acceptable age for signed messages, older signed messages will be discarded

        Disconnects from the Mqtt server
        Parameters:
        actionListener - the callback to call upon successful disconnection or error

      • publish

        public void publish(java.lang.String topic,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    int qos,
                    boolean retained,
                    IUbiActionListener actionListener)
        Publishes a message on the connected Mqtt server
        Parameters:
        topic - the Mqtt topic to publish to
        message - the message to publish
        qos - the Mqtt qos to use
        retained - publish the message as a retained Mqtt message if true
        actionListener - the callback to call upon success or error

      • publish

                    java.lang.String message,
                    IUbiActionListener actionListener)
        Publishes a message on the connected Mqtt server with default qos=1 and retained = false
        Parameters:
        topic - the Mqtt topic to publish to
        message - the message to publish
        actionListener - the callback to call upon success or error

      • publishSigned

        public void publishSigned(java.lang.String topic,
                          java.lang.String message,
                          int qos,
                          boolean retained,
                          java.lang.String privateKey,
                          IUbiActionListener actionListener)
        Publishes a signed message on the connected Mqtt server
        Parameters:
        topic - the Mqtt topic to publish to
        message - the message to publish
        qos - the Mqtt qos to use
        retained - publish the message as a retained Mqtt message if true
        privateKey - the private key in .pem format to sign the message with
        actionListener - the callback to call upon success or error

      • publishSigned

        public void publishSigned(java.lang.String topic,
                          java.lang.String message,
                          java.lang.String privateKey,
                          IUbiActionListener actionListener)
        Publishes a signed message on the connected Mqtt server with default qos=1 and retained = false
        Parameters:
        topic - the Mqtt topic to publish to
        message - the message to publish
        privateKey - the private key in .pem format to sign the message with
        actionListener - the callback to call upon success or error

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(java.lang.String topic,
                      IUbiMessageListener listener,
                      IUbiActionListener actionListener)
        Subscribes to a Mqtt topic on the connected Mqtt server
        Parameters:
        topic - the Mqtt topic to subscribe to
        listener - the listener function to call whenever a message matching the topic arrives
        actionListener - the listener to be called upon successful subscription or error

      • subscribeSigned

        public void subscribeSigned(java.lang.String topic,
                            java.lang.String[] publicKeys,
                            IUbiMessageListener listener,
                            IUbiActionListener actionListener)
        Subscribes to messages signed by particular keypairs on a Mqtt topic on the connected Mqtt server
        Parameters:
        topic - the Mqtt topic to subscribe to
        publicKeys - the public keys the messages are checked against
        listener - the listener function to call whenever a message matching the topic and signed with one of the publicKeys arrives
        actionListener - the callback to be called upon successful subscription or error

      • subscribeFromPublisher

        public void subscribeFromPublisher(java.lang.String topic,
                                   java.lang.String publisherName,
                                   IUbiMessageListener listener,
                                   IUbiActionListener actionListener)
        Subscribes to messages on a Mqtt topic on the connected Mqtt server signed by a known publiser The public key of the publiser is used for recognizing the messages originating from the publisher. The public key of the publisher is fetched from the Mqtt topic publishers/publishername/publicKey and kept up-to-date with the help of a regular Mqtt subscription
        Parameters:
        topic - the Mqtt topic to subscribe to
        publisherName - the name of the known publisher
        listener - the listener to call whenever a message matching the topic and signed with the publicKey arrives
        actionListener - the callback to be called upon successful subscription or error
